Articles.Content:
Hi all,

i have some problems since some time.

everytime i play the game crashes sporadically without any error message. 

i have installes several Addons and i don't want to try each one by one if this is causing the problem.

at the following link you can find the error messages KSP is saving. They are from the last 3 days.

 

https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B3ZUJfhze_MsS2s1THVrcURGZVE&usp=sharing

 

I don't have any idea what is causing this problem, maybe you can help me with this.

 

Regards

C
